# The `SafepointIRVerifierPass` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Create an instance of the safepoint verifier pass which can be added to a pass pipeline to check for relocation bugs. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

## Description {#details}

Create an instance of the safepoint verifier pass which can be added to a pass pipeline to check for relocation bugs.
